meanings.definition: A person or thing that flosses.
meanings.sent1: Dentists recommend using flossers daily to keep your teeth clean.
meanings.sent2: I bought some new flossers to help improve my oral hygiene routine.
meanings.sent3: The little flossers in the bathroom were having a party, celebrating their role in dental health.
meanings.sent4: The diligent flossers worked together like a team of tiny cleaners, ensuring every tooth was spotless.
meanings.sent5: In the land of healthy smiles, the flossers were the unsung heroes, quietly fighting plaque and cavities.

meanings.definition: A tool used for flossing teeth.
meanings.sent1: My dentist recommended using flossers to reach those tricky spots between teeth.
meanings.sent2: I keep a pack of flossers in my bag for quick dental care on the go.
meanings.sent3: The flossers in the bathroom drawer were having a race to see who could floss the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The flossers were like tiny bridges, connecting each tooth to a cleaner, healthier mouth.
meanings.sent5: With a flick of the wrist, the flossers glided between teeth, removing debris and leaving a fresh feeling behind.
